question: Who is the author of the book “Fortune Turners: The Quartet That Spun India To Glory”?
explanation: The book titled “Fortune Turners: The Quartet That Spun India To Glory” has been authored by Aditya Bhushan and Sachin Bajaj. It is an ode to the famous Indian spin quartet of Bishan Singh Bedi, Erapalli Prasanna, Bhagwat Chandrashekhar and Srinivas Venkataraghavan, who took 853 Test wickets among them.
